mapper.select: CREATE OR replace view temp_score as ( select sys_user.id as studentId , zyf_score.score , zyf_kc.kc_name as kcName from zyf_score, sys_user, zyf_kc where zyf_score.student_id = sys_user.id and zyf_score.kc_id = zyf_kc.id and zyf_kc.id != 1 ); select zyf_bj.bj_name as bjName, avg(zyf_score.score) as score from zyf_score, sys_user, zyf_kc, zyf_bj where zyf_score.kc_id = zyf_kc.id and zyf_score.student_id = sys_user.id and zyf_bj.id = sys_user.org_code and zyf_bj.nj_id = #{query.njId} and sys_user.org_code in ( select id from zyf_bj where zyf_bj.zy_id = #{query.zyId} ) group by zyf_bj.id order by score desc
